LanguageData.AbilityDisabledNoFertilinGene: Pawn doesn't have required fertilin gene.
LanguageData.MentalBreakNoFertilin: This happened because of low fertilin.
LanguageData.AlertLowFertilinDesc: A colonist has low fertilin. At this point they are becoming desperate enough to consider rape and bestiality to obtain fertilin (if they didn't already). At zero fertilin they will lose all sense and start raping randomly
LanguageData.SuccubusLeaving: {0} has fed enough on your colonists and will now leave.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_sexdemon_visit_incident_descri: The dirty dreams of your colonists have attracted succubi.\n\nThey will hang around for a couple of days trying to seduce your colonists. They may decide to join your colony, if they are impressed by your colonists's sexual prowess.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_succubus_joins_letter_descript: {0} enjoys it here and has decided to stay.
